```{r echo=FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
      class = "talk-author",
      paste(rmarkdown::metadata$author, collapse = " &middot; "),

      span(paste(rmarkdown::metadata$institute, collapse = ", "))

    div(
      class = "talk-date",
      knitr::knit(text = rmarkdown::metadata$date, quiet = TRUE)
    )
  )
)
```
